medical_history.chief_complaint: Symptomatic lactic acidosis in HIV-infected patients on antiretroviral therapy
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms such as nausea, emesis, and abdominal pain occurred 1â€“14 days prior to hospitalization. Eight patients experienced rapid weight loss before presentation. Changes in symptoms progressed rapidly toward multiple-organ failure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Extensive prior exposure to nucleoside analog reverse-transcriptase inhibitors (NRTIs); prior acute weight loss.
medical_history.social_history: Known alcohol consumption in one patient, mostly none reported; history of diabetes mellitus in two patients.
